Package task_gamification.helpers

Class UIComponentHelper

java.lang.Object
task_gamification.helpers.UIComponentHelper
public class UIComponentHelper extends Object
Helperclass for easier implementation of UI-Components.

    • createSpinner

      public static JSpinner createSpinner(int minValue, int maxValue, int stepSize, int initialValue, int x, int y, int width, int height)
      Creates a JSpinner with specified properties.
      Parameters:
      minValue - The minimum value of JSpinner.
      maxValue - The maximum value of JSpinner.
      stepSize - The stepsize for clicking through JSpinner.
      initialValue - The initial value set in JSpinner.
      x - The x-coordinate of the password field.
      y - The y-coordinate of the password field.
      width - The width of the password field.
      height - The height of the password field.
      Returns:
      The created JSpinner object.
